question: When was Ramabai awarded the Kaise-i-Hind Medal?
explanation: Pandita Ramabai was awarded the Kaiser-i-Hind Medal in 1919 by the British Government for her distinguished service to the Indian Education system. The social benefit of transforming the lives of Widows from being considered as a burden on society to an empowered Individual who could make Economic Contribution to the Society was also Acknowledged
